mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_MONEY, TEACHER_YN, ADMIN_YN FROM MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBER_NAME ASC
